title: Publishing editorial supplements with Wolters Kluwer
description: Wolters Kluwer journals provide an efficient, simple-yet-thorough service to publish your content and shine a light on your brand. With our bespoke offerings, we can tailor to your needs and to your budget.
cleaned_text: Getting your brand and your content under the spotlight Our dedicated and expert team will guide you through the entire process: from developing your idea to ensuring the final product reaches its intended audience. A supplement issue is separate to the regular journal issue and focuses on a specific topic, or caters to a specific audience. This can be, but is not limited to, reviews, research articles, guidelines, reports, conference abstracts, or proceedings. The content undergoes the same rigorous peer review as all Wolters Kluwer content, so your readers can be assured of its quality.
